item.description:
The adventure guide company Inkaland Journeys is putting together three premier Peruvian Andes’ trekking experiences that include a combination of different itineraries.

Cordillera Blanca Range/Santa Cruz circuit trek with the option to summit Mount Pisco (18,893 ft) for June 20 – 30, 2011.

Cordillera Huayhuash Range Mini Trek & Festival of the Sun at Huánuco Pampa for July 22 – August 5, 2011.

Discovering Cuzco, Sacred Valley of the Incas, Machu Picchu & Lake Titicaca   from August 5 – 13, 2011.

These three incredible adventure experiences guided by Inkaland Journeys will thrust Meetup trekking adventurist into the world of unparalleled pristine beauty and intrigue in the ancient land of the late Inca civilization. The Cordillera Blanca and Huayhuash spectacular mountain ranges are within Peru’s Parque Nacional Huascaran (was car rahn) and their trekking circuits are rated as some of the world’s most magnificent. You will be face to face with Peru’s most spectacular spiraling white-capped Andean peaks, experience the culture in seeing and interacting with the warm, gentle, Quechua (ket chu ah) mountain people, see their stone-thatched dwelling in the natural traditional environment as they have lived for thousands of years as you capture an adventure travel experience of a life time. For those who experience the greatness and mystic of the ancient Inca capital of Cusco, visit Machu Picchu, the Scared Valley of the Incas and explore the beauty of Lake Titicaca, we’ve got you covered with a comprehensive and unforgettable tour of the great Inca civilization.

So if you seek to live your best now and want to crystallize your desire for a “national geographic” trekking/touring experience, then these adventure trips are not out of bounds for you. Sign-up now and experience the life-changing consequences of your decision.

Want inspiration? Come preview these adventure journeys free on Thursday, 02/17/11 at 6:45 PM (presentation starts at 7:00 PM) at the:

Best Western Hotel
220 Alewife Brook Parkway
Cambridge, MA 02138
(617) 491-8000
www.hoteltria.com

The hotel is about ½ mile from the Alewife T Station and parking at the hotel is free. I feel confident that you will find this Peruvian Adventure presentation a 10 on the drool scale of “must-do” adventure trips.

Inkaland Journeys will meticulously plan, coordinate and manage all in-country logistic tour/ trek details so Meetup members simply enjoy the trekking/touring while we pamper you from the moment you land in Lima to the moment you depart Peru. Most of the trekking, and most of the campsites, are above the 13,000 ft tree line with the snowline starting at approximately 15,700 ft so these majestic peaks are right up close. You become the experience. While decent physical conditioning is necessary, only daypacks are necessary since burros carry your personal gear, our tents, cooking/dining equipment and supplies. Professional UIAGM certified guides, assistant guides with rescue horses and mountain cooks making delicious meals are all there to support and facilitate your high Andes adventure experience. Elevate your expectations and become what you think. With the clicker in your hand, hit the next trip button and capture the Andes spirit…experience the journey on these unforgettable Peruvian Andes’ adventure trips. The more the merrier - it holds true for both our group size and our discount. Call Greg Horton at (860) 977-5017 (email gh1.inkalandjourneys@gmail.com) for any questions regarding cost and travel logistics and sign up now through inkalandjourneys.com.
item.name: Learn more about our Peruvian Exploration trips...
